main event: Seven civilians reported seeing a fiery streak in the sky that they believed might have been a flying disc in Birmingham, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was described as having a long fiery streak as its tail., Witnesses noted the object traveled at a high rate of speed and seemed to grow bright then dim before disappearing., One witness, a former newspaper reporter, called it the most amazing thing he had ever seen., The tail of the object was approximately one-half to three-fourths the size of the object itself., The sighting lasted about 15 seconds and occurred on 5 May 1950.
